roleset.name: puke, throw up
roleset.note: VOMIT-V NOTES: Verbnet entry breathe-40.1.2. (from vomit.01-v)
VOMITING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. Comparison to 'vomit.01'. See VN class breath-40.1.2. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from vomiting.01-n)

roles.note: arg1 predicted-- will probably need to be added at some point. (from vomit.01-v)

example.name: nominal, no args
example.text: The council's annual report has psyllium on its last page, lumped with such unglamorous export items as sarsaparilla and ``Nux vomica,'' a plant that induces vomiting.

example.name: ARG0
example.text: What they did is like these true sayings : `` A dog vomits and goes back to what it threw up . ''

example.name: With arg 0
example.text: Doctors first assumed Colton's vomiting was due to the flu

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: He also vomited up the stone which he was tricked into swallowing.
example.arg: the stone which he was tricked into swallowing.
